suncertify.panels
Class AbstractInputDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      suncertify.panels.AbstractInputDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileOpenDialog, RMIAddressDialog
public abstract class AbstractInputDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

A modal dialog box that dynamically enables and disables the OK button depending on the value entered by the user. The subclass will have to do the GUI layout. Thread safety: not thread safe

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

AbstractInputDialog

public AbstractInputDialog(java.awt.Frame owner,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           SavedParameter savedParameterName)
Construct a new AbstractInputDialog.

Parameters:
owner - the Frame from which the dialog is displayed
title - the String to display in the dialog's title bar
savedParameterName - the parameter associated with the input field. The input field value will be saved when the OK button is pressed.
